segmentosSRT.text: All right, do it yourself. But please don't cry.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Well?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text:
Why don't you go home?
There'll be other times.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Your wife is right here.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text:
What's with you?
Can't take "no" for an answer?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: You want to make me lose face? Go away!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: I thought I'd live my final days here.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text:
I'd heard you'd had a boy,
and were living at home.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: But I was too ashamed to see you.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Let's put the past behind us...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: I've paid the rent with mother's jewelry.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: It's crowded with all of us here.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: I'll tidy up tomorrow. We'll be fine.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text:
Chunsheng and I are lucky
to meet someone as nice as you.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: You've looked after us.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: I'm home.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: But it's not just that.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text:
Must not be politically backward.
You can sleep later.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: The District Chief has come.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: I've found just the man for her.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Does she mind us playing matchmaker?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text:
She's not opposed,
she does fret about leaving us.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text:
Comrade Wan works
at the East Wind Factory.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text:
His father and grandfather
were workers, too.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Solid working class stock.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: I approve.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Chunsheng.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Erxi, drink up.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Well?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Why?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: I don't know.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Have you seen her body?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: I'm just going to see him.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: He's all right.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Just hungry.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Hasn't been fed for three days!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: I'll go buy some buns.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Dr. Wang, have some buns.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text:
- Don't be stupid.
- It was a joke.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: What name do you like?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: It's okay.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: We shouldn't have given him water.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: How about in here?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: This box is bigger, isn't it?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: They'll have more room to run around.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Then they'll eat more.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: And soon they'll grow up.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: And then...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: and the sheep will turn into oxen.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08
